document_data.name: Black Claw
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Claw''' was an [[orc]] horde assembled by the [[Brotherhood of the Scarlet Scourge]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1026}},

The horde successfully killed the Waterdeep's leader, [[Laroun|Warlord Laroun]], before finally being defeated in the [[Stump Bog]] by Laroun's successor, [[Raurlor]]. Their defeat marked the end of Uruth Ukrypt and the Brotherhood of the Scarlet Scourge as major players in the region.
